segments.text: My name is Mary , and I will be your server this evening .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi Mary . We are really looking forward to a great meal here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I interest you in an appetizer to start out ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would love an appetizer . Are they listed in the menu ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have our daily appetizers listed on the board over there on the wall .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am thinking about the popcorn shrimp . How is that ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That would be a great choice !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll trust your taste and take one order of that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have a special where you can order a second appetizer for half price .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In that case , we'll take an order of onion rings with our first choice .
segments.speaker: S2
